body.name: Personalized Notecards Monogram Custom Stationery Personalized Stationary Set Notecard Set Stationery Set Custom Hostess Gift Thank You Note

byLineInfo.name: Visit the The White Invite Gifts Store

features: - PERSONALIZED CARDS: Choose your amount! From sets of 10 all the way to 100. Personalized with the name of your choice. Click ‘CUSTOMIZE & ADD TO CART’ to choose your personalization.
- SIZE: 5.5” x 4.25” folded or flat note cards
- PRINTING: Digitally printed on professional printers for a crisp, vivid print. Personalize with your choice of colors shown in product images.

- PAPER & ENVELOPE: High quality, linen lightly textured, white 100lb card stock. Envelopes are 70 lb text weight thickness. Choose your color choice from the swatches shown in images. The White Invite’s Logo will appear on back of card.
- PACKAGING: Packaged in a crystal clear, resealable cello sleeve - perfect for gifting! 💕 We design and print everything in our small workshop here in North Carolina.
body.description: How to Personalize Click the yellow 'CUSTOMIZE' button. Choose your quantity of notecards (folded or flat)Type your personalization, and choose ink & envelope colors. Make your correspondence truly unique with our personalized notecards. From heartfelt messages to professional notes, our custom notecards add a personal touch to every word. Choose from a variety of designs and personalize them with your name, monogram, or design. Our personalized notecards are the perfect way to make a lasting impression. Start sending thoughtful and stylish notes today with our premium selection of personalized notecards.
